text: I started adding the _find API but it looks like it won’t go through the transaction manager interface
since this is a query method ?
can you guide me on the code structure so I know how to implement that method

I’m going through the gowalker docs but the sourcegraph links are giving me 404s: <https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/hyperledger/fabric/-/info/GoPackage/github.com/hyperledger/fabric/-/ChaincodeStub>
QueryChaincode locally calls the specified chaincode `Query` using the same transaction context; that is, chaincode calling chaincode doesn't create a new transaction message.
ok that answers my question … for those who may be interested in this
